NewsArticle.Title: Battle Server Bug
NewsArticle.Content:
To resolve the Battle Server Bug,
1) Delete the Dark Ages Folder in the KRU folder.
2) Using the same installer you already downloaded, reinstall the client.
3) delete the shortcut on the desktop.
4) create a new shortcut using the executable in the ..\KRU\Dark Ages\ folder.
or
You can download the new client DA703a.exe in the download section of the website.
